name: Czaszki + Electra
overview: This is a compilation of two games: - "Czaszki" is an arcade puzzle board game. The player's task is to place the skulls (the remains of shamans) in the sarcophagus. The player can use a variety of useful items, such as dynamite (blasting), the elixir of force (moving metal grates, anti-spirit protection), key (open door). Fire, stalactites, ghosts, gnome and cannon must be avoided - contact with them means death. In addition the player can collect diamonds for extra points and push some of the objects, such as barrels or stones. "Electra" is a puzzle board game. The player's task is to connect the electrical equipment with cables. The player must avoid objects destroying the cables, such as electrical short circuit, acid dripping taps, exploding bombs.
